title: Organised Trips
text: We regularly organise trips around the world to amazing locations for photography. All involved are encouraged to improve their photography skills while travelling.

title: Community
text: We are constantly working on expanding our community and educating people in the art of photography. We are ready to accept all skilled photographers into our company.

title: Special Discounts
text: We give special discount on Hollidays and special events throughout the year and also, our returning customers get a 10% discount on all.
